last_episode_to_air.name: New Man
last_episode_to_air.overview: From the bitter to the smooth: João looks back — and forward. Anne gets bad news, and Gonçalo hits pay dirt. All roads lead to an explosive end.

name: Glória
overview: A small town in Portugal becomes engulfed in a web of political intrigue when a young engineer is recruited as a KGB spy in this historical thriller.

episodes.name: Onwards To Victory
episodes.overview: In 1968, João begins his new job at RARET in Glória do Ribatejo, at the front of a Cold War fight for hearts and minds. But he has a larger mission.

episodes.name: Confession Absolves Us Of Any Guilt
episodes.overview: Danger closes in: James tries to track the culprit behind the missing reel. Ursula sticks her neck out for João, who's haunted by memories of war.

episodes.name: We Do Not Discuss The Nation
episodes.overview: The craft gets complicated, quickly, as João eavesdrops then confronts Gonçalo. At the keyboard, Alexandre shows his hand and reveals his suspicions.

episodes.name: Death Is Never Natural
episodes.overview: After the autopsy, James applies pressure to Doc. Anne's sultry soiree serves up food, drink — and intel. Sparks fly when Carolina realizes a dream.

episodes.name: Looking At The Moon From Below
episodes.overview: Will he fete — and flip? James asks João to escort a defecting Soviet scientist. Carolina finds a refuge, and the mystery around Mia persists.

episodes.name: The Misfortune
episodes.overview: The war heats up on all fronts while James questions João, Fernando comes under fire, and Henrique scores a key position. The CIA go on a mole hunt.

episodes.name: The Leak…
episodes.overview: A rough night turns into an even rougher day: A desperate João on the edge of exposure turns to Carolina for help. Bill discovers a truth about Doc.

episodes.name: Public Virtues…
episodes.overview: Under a microscope, João must think fast at the hospital. Anne airs her suspicions. Alexandre questions Doc. A trip to a psychiatrist yields a secret.

episodes.name: The Mole
episodes.overview: Sofia returns to the scene of the fire. Parker makes his presence known at RARET. A conflict combusts as João tries to get to the heart of a killing.

episodes.name: New Man
episodes.overview: From the bitter to the smooth: João looks back — and forward. Anne gets bad news, and Gonçalo hits pay dirt. All roads lead to an explosive end.
